title: Emerald Radiance Jhumkas - పచ్చ రంగుల జుంకాలు
materials: South Sea Pearl. Exquisite craftsmanship with Hyderabadi Polish.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas feature a classic silhouette reimagined with intricate openwork design. The delicate floral pattern cascading down the bell shape is reminiscent of traditional Nakshi work, while the diamond-encrusted top and emerald centerpiece add a touch of contemporary elegance. The South Sea pearl at the base is cradled by a fringe of shimmering diamond drops.
occasions: or as a statement piece for any special occasion. They will add a regal touch to half-saree function (Langa Voni).
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary flair, these Jhumkas are a testament to exquisite craftsmanship. The use of high-quality materials, including a natural emerald and radiant diamonds, ensures lasting value and unmatched brilliance. Perfect heirloom piece to add to your jewellery box.
